verbose_text: The present study has shown that overexpression of LRP6 not only promoted the expression of MMP-2 and MMP-9, but also inhibited the secretion of TIMP-1 and TIMP-2, in trophoblast cells, whereas transfection with siLRP6 led to entirely the opposite effects on gestational choriocarcinoma cells.
evidence: MMP-2 and MMP-9, but also inhibited the secretion of TIMP-1
